snippet: The so-called hybrid zone where two closely related species of the bird meet and mate corresponds to global warming.
abstract: Study in journal Current Biology finds that chickadee mating grounds are moving further north at rate that matches warming trend in winter temperatures.
lead_paragraph: The so-called hybrid zone where two closely related species of the bird meet and mate corresponds to global warming.

headline.main: A Chickadee Mating Zone Surges North
headline.print_headline: Climate: A Chickadee Mating Zone Surges North
